巑字的基本解释

巑
cuán
〔巑岏（
峻峭的山，如“登巑巑以长企兮。”
山耸列的样子，如“敛巨石于江中，崔嵬巑巑，列作三峰。”
w俷 ）〕a.峻峭，如“（山）盘岸巑巑。”

巑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuán］
［《廣韻》在丸切，平桓，從。］
亦作“1”。
(1)高耸。
(2)见“巑岏”。

巑字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巑； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页322第41
【廣韻】在丸切【集韻】徂丸切，?音攢。巑岏，山竦列貌。【宋玉·高唐賦】盤岸巑岏。【註】巑岏，銳山也。

巑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
巑字的起名意思

高耸。

Sip
Basic explanation of words
Sip
cuán
〔巑岏(
A steep mountain, such as "Climb and squash for a long time."
The appearance of the towering mountains is like "Grabbing huge boulders in the river, Cui Wei gracious, listed as the three peaks."
w 俷)] a. Steep, such as "(mountain) pan'an sip."
Sip
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuán]
["Guangyun" is cut in Maru, Pinghuan, from. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Towering.
(2) See "巑岏".
Sip
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　巑; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 322-41
[Guang Yun] In Maru Kiri [Ji Yun] Maru Kiri, the sound is saved. The mountain is full of looks. 【Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu】Pan'an 巑岏. [Note] Gai 岏, also sharp mountain.
